author: Bob Ortega, Scott Bronstein, Curt Devine and Drew Griffin, CNN
title: How the government delayed coronavirus testing
description: A weeks-long testing delay that effectively blinded public health officials to the spread of the coronavirus in the US might have been avoided had federal agencies fully enacted their own plan to ramp up testing during a national health crisis.
content:
(CNN)A weeks-long testing delay that effectively blinded public health officials to the spread of the coronavirus in the US might have been avoided had federal agencies fully enacted their own plan to ramp up testing during a national health crisis.
